name: AP_CLAIM_IF_NDC_REIMB_SEP
description: This table extracts data received from prospective payment systems (PPS) pricer for a claim in POB3.ESRD 'NDC Reimbursement Indicator - Separately Payable'.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: NCD_REIMB_IND_SEP
columns.description: Identifies the amount of former Part D drug utilized for cost outlier calculation. Data received in POB3.ESRD block on incoming message.
